transcript.text:
￼














Template & Studio


Managing Images
Images

3 min
overview & purpose this tab allows the admin to add images made available for their customers to use in designer studio for creating or personalizing product templates screen at a glance at a glance, you can check thumbnails of all the images with their titles, image names, keywords (if added any), and their category using the category filter you can easily search the images by category you can anytime add a keyword to the images and change their category using the pen like icons the images are divided into several tabs, where you can upload images of every kind add new image for adding a new image, navigate to the admin >> designer studio >> images >> images tab and click on the add button select the image category for the new image and upload multiple images under that category at once the clear queue button becomes useful if you are uploading multiple images and you need to stop the upload process in between you can also add a "keyword" while adding an image(s), these keywords will be used to search the specific uploaded image(s) on the designer studio using the search button
Did this page help you?
